verses.verse: Thou <WH859> also, son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> take <WH3947> thee a tile, <WH3843> and lay <WH5414> it before <WH6440> thee, and portray <WH2710> upon <WH5921> it the city, <WH5892> even <WH853> Jerusalem: <WH3389>

And lay <WH5414> siege <WH4692> against <WH5921> it, and build <WH1129> a fort <WH1785> against <WH5921> it, and cast <WH8210> a mount <WH5550> against <WH5921> it; set <WH5414> the camp <WH4264> also against <WH5921> it, and set <WH7760> battering rams <WH3733> against <WH5921> it round about. <WH5439>

Moreover take <WH3947> thou <WH859> unto thee an iron <WH1270> pan, <WH4227> and set <WH5414> it for a wall <WH7023> of iron <WH1270> between <WH996> thee and the city: <WH5892> and set <WH3559> <WH853> thy face <WH6440> against <WH413> it, and it shall be <WH1961> besieged, <WH4692> and thou shalt lay siege <WH6696> against <WH5921> it. This <WH1931> shall be a sign <WH226> to the house <WH1004> of Israel. <WH3478>

Lie <WH7901> thou <WH859> also upon <WH5921> thy left <WH8042> side, <WH6654> and lay <WH7760> <WH853> the iniquity <WH5771> of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> upon <WH5921> it: according to the number <WH4557> of the days <WH3117> that <WH834> thou shalt lie <WH7901> upon <WH5921> it thou shalt bear <WH5375> <WH853> their iniquity. <WH5771>

For I <WH589> have laid <WH5414> upon thee <WH853> the years <WH8141> of their iniquity, <WH5771> according to the number <WH4557> of the days, <WH3117> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> and ninety <WH8673> days: <WH3117> so shalt thou bear <WH5375> the iniquity <WH5771> of the house <WH1004> of Israel. <WH3478>

And when thou hast accomplished <WH3615> <WH853> them, <WH428> lie <WH7901> again <WH8145> on <WH5921> thy right <WH3233> side, <WH6654> and thou shalt bear <WH5375> <WH853> the iniquity <WH5771> of the house <WH1004> of Judah <WH3063> forty <WH705> days: <WH3117> I have appointed <WH5414> thee each day for a year. <WH3117> <WH8141> <WH3117> <WH8141>

Therefore thou shalt set <WH3559> thy face <WH6440> toward <WH413> the siege <WH4692> of Jerusalem, <WH3389> and thine arm <WH2220> shall be uncovered, <WH2834> and thou shalt prophesy <WH5012> against <WH5921> it.

And, behold, <WH2009> I will lay <WH5414> bands <WH5688> upon <WH5921> thee, and thou shalt not <WH3808> turn <WH2015> thee from one side <WH4480> <WH6654> to <WH413> another, <WH6654> till <WH5704> thou hast ended <WH3615> the days <WH3117> of thy siege. <WH4692>

Take <WH3947> thou <WH859> also unto thee wheat, <WH2406> and barley, <WH8184> and beans, <WH6321> and lentils, <WH5742> and millet, <WH1764> and fitches, <WH3698> and put <WH5414> them in one <WH259> vessel, <WH3627> and make <WH6213> thee bread <WH3899> thereof, according to the number <WH4557> of the days <WH3117> that <WH834> thou <WH859> shalt lie <WH7901> upon <WH5921> thy side, <WH6654> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> and ninety <WH8673> days <WH3117> shalt thou eat <WH398> thereof.

And thy meat <WH3978> which <WH834> thou shalt eat <WH398> shall be by weight, <WH4946> twenty <WH6242> shekels <WH8255> a day: <WH3117> from time <WH4480> <WH6256> to <WH5704> time <WH6256> shalt thou eat <WH398> it.
Thou shalt drink <WH8354> also water <WH4325> by measure, <WH4884> the sixth part <WH8345> of a hin: <WH1969> from time <WH4480> <WH6256> to <WH5704> time <WH6256> shalt thou drink. <WH8354>
And thou shalt eat <WH398> it as barley <WH8184> cakes, <WH5692> and thou shalt bake <WH5746> it <WH1931> with dung <WH1561> that cometh out <WH6627> of man, <WH120> in their sight. <WH5869>

And the LORD <WH3068> said, <WH559> Even thus <WH3602> shall the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> eat <WH398> their defiled <WH2931> <WH853> bread <WH3899> among the Gentiles, <WH1471> whither <WH834> <WH8033> I will drive <WH5080> them.

Then said <WH559> I, Ah <WH162> Lord <WH136> GOD! <WH3069> behold, <WH2009> my soul <WH5315> hath not <WH3808> been polluted: <WH2930> for from my youth <WH4480> <WH5271> up even till <WH5704> now <WH6258> have I not <WH3808> eaten <WH398> of that which dieth of itself, <WH5038> or is torn in pieces; <WH2966> neither <WH3808> came <WH935> there abominable <WH6292> flesh <WH1320> into my mouth. <WH6310>

Then he said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, Lo, <WH7200> I have given <WH5414> thee <WH853> cow's <WH1241> dung <WH6832> for <WH8478> man's <WH120> dung, <WH1561> and thou shalt prepare <WH6213> <WH853> thy bread <WH3899> therewith. <WH5921>

Moreover he said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> behold, <WH2009> I will break <WH7665> the staff <WH4294> of bread <WH3899> in Jerusalem: <WH3389> and they shall eat <WH398> bread <WH3899> by weight, <WH4948> and with care; <WH1674> and they shall drink <WH8354> water <WH4325> by measure, <WH4884> and with astonishment: <WH8078>
That <WH4616> they may want <WH2637> bread <WH3899> and water, <WH4325> and be astonished <WH8074> one <WH376> with another, <WH251> and consume away <WH4743> for their iniquity. <WH5771>
